segments.text: There are so many potential dangers in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: First, the overflowing sink is creating a very slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could easily slip and fall in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, there's the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is teetering; it looks like it's moments away from tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could seriously injure himself or break a lot of dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness is almost a hazard in itself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely missing all these clear signs of impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a slow-motion catastrophe unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash of the stool and the splash of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is fraught with peril for everyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope someone intervenes before things get truly bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of those children getting hurt is quite upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR
